name: Leech Bot
description: A Telegram bot to leech content from provided links.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token for your Telegram bot from BotFather

DATABASE_URL.description: URL for the database (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL)

API_ID.description: API ID obtained from the Telegram API

API_HASH.description: API hash obtained from the Telegram API

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram ID of the bot owner
